description: Oracle's research and assignment system for LLM optimization. This capability scrapes LLM leaderboards, analyzes benchmark results, determines optimal models for each bot's specialization, updates the LLM preferences file, and conducts overnight research to stay current with the latest models. All bots read Oracle's preferences to know which models to use.

usage.input: Bot specializations, benchmark data, cost constraints
usage.output: LLM assignments, reasoning, preferences file updates
typical_use_cases: Oracle analyzing which models excel at engineering vs design
Oracle assigning Gemini 2.0 Flash Exp to most bots
